contentfulPagePressRelease.title: QF Ramadan Instagram competition results: Day 1

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation Ramadan Instagram Competition Results (Day 1)

On day 1 we posted the following picture:


The correct answer for day 1 was Ramadan (رمضان).
We got a total of 52 comments, 22 of which were correct answers! Only the 1st 5 answers will be awarded points, and the winners of day 1 were:

Name Points
yousefhammad100 10
almannai_qtr 8
mghasrah 6
hussainhumoda 4
nqat 2

We will be posting the second picture today at 12:00pm Qatar time. Stay tuned with us on Instagram and try to be the first to answer, to get your name on the leader’s table, or improve your position on it!
